features.title: Competitive Visibility
features.description: See where you stand relative to competitors in the AI's knowledge layer. Understand who gets recommended, and why.

features.title: AI Selection Rate
features.description: Quantify how often AI systems choose your brand when answering queries in your category. The metric that matters in the generative era.

features.title: LLM Brand Sentiment
features.description: Analyse how AI models perceive your brand by examining semantic associations in their training data. No guesswork, just observable patterns.

features.title: SXO & Semantic Architecture
features.description: Optimising site architecture and EEAT signals to provide a crawlable, authoritative base for AI agents.

features.title: Entity Optimisation
features.description: Strengthen your brand's knowledge graph presence. Clear entity relationships mean consistent AI representation across platforms.

features.title: Content Authority Signals
features.description: We execute technical and content strategies to build "Machine Trust," ensuring your brand is the cited authority for your core topics.

features.title: AI Agent Optimisation
features.description: Prepare for the shift from human-driven search to AI-driven transactions by optimising for autonomous agent protocols.

features.title: Data Provenance
features.description: Verifiable, trustworthy data is the currency of AI commerce. Establish clear provenance chains that agents can validate.

features.title: Agentic Protocol Setup
features.description: Optimising product data for OpenAI's ACP, Google's UCP, and Anthropic's MCP protocols to ensure "choosability."

features.title: Generative Engine Advertising
features.description: Prepare the strategic infrastructure needed to leverage paid advertising opportunities within generative AI environments.

features.title: Run campaigns with incredible intent signals
